features.title: Finally, a tool for easy land lease contract and land management
Accurate information about parcels, owners, and contracts
The application monitors expiring land lease contracts and rental agreements for you
Display of land from both owner's and farmer's perspective
Automation of administrative processes, including payment orders and tax declaration generation
Connection with the real estate cadastre and display of land registry (LPIS) blocks
CleverAssets tool is currently available for the Czech Republic
